_header: It was upon a holiday / As Luke in our gospel gan say
Note: For the version in the ‘expanded’ Cycle see 4683.
_description: Gospel for the Seventeenth Sunday after Trinity, in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Hit was vppon an holy dayAs Luc in vre gospel wol
                    say…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…And I wol telle ȝou forþiHou God hire heled
                    gostly
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title: Cum Intrassett Ihesu in domum cuidam (f. 208rb)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodAsh42.First Lines:
It was apon a halidaieAls luke in oure gospel gon
                    saie…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…Of þis woman i will ȝow tellAnd ȝe will lithen
                    to my spell
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
Als Seynt Luk til vs wille sayIt was vpon an haly
                    day…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…And slake þe bondes of oure synneAnd graunte vs þat
                    blisse þat þou art inne Amen
CULAdd8335.Attributed Title:
Dominica xvija post festum trinitatis secundum lucam (p.
                    306)

CULDd11.First Lines:
AS seynt Luke to vs wile sayit was vp on an
                    haliday…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…& slake þe bondis of oure synneand graunte vs
                    þe blisse þat þu art inne Amen
CULDd11.Attributed Title:
Dominica xvij post festum sancte trinitatis. Euangelium secundum Lucam.
                        Cum intraret ihesus in domum cuiusdam principis phariseorum sabbato
                        manducare & ce. (p. 192))

CULGg531.First Lines:
Þat man may well do chariteTo hele man on haly
                    day…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…Of þis woman I wyll ȝow tellAnd ȝe wyll lysten
                    to my spell

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
It was apon a haly dayAls luke in owre gospell wyl
                    saye…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…Of þis woman I wyll ȝow tellAnd ȝe wyll listen
                    to my spell

MinULZ822.First Lines:
It was apone a halydayAls Luke in oure gospell wyll
                    say…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…And I wyll tell ȝow forthyHow god helyde hyre
                    gastly
MinULZ822.Attributed Title:
Dominica xxvii post festum sancte Trinitatis Secundum Lucam (f.
                    156)

HunHM129.First Lines:
Hit wos a pon an holy dayAs Luc in oure gospell will
                    say…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…And I woll tell ȝow forthiHow god hir helid
                    gostely
HunHM129.Attributed Title: Dominica septima decima post festum trinitatis (f. 165)
